prompts: Create a fluffy Pokemon with a cute face and pastel colors that embodies sweetness.
Show me a small, round creature made of cotton candy, perfect for a fairy-type design.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a cloud with big, expressive eyes and a playful demeanor.
Generate a whimsical Pokemon that thrives in forests and has a soft, pillowy texture.
Design a tiny Pokemon with pink fur that loves to play and spread joy wherever it goes.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a candy treat and has a bubbly, light-hearted personality.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a dessert and is known for its charming and friendly nature.
